ValidationRule.description: Prevents marking application as Ready to Submit without completing all required fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Ready to Submit"), OR( ISBLANK(Business_Name__c), ISNULL(Primary_Contact__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Business_Model__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot mark as Ready to Submit. Please complete: Business Name, Primary Contact, and Business Model.
